name: com.unity.ui.builder
description:
UI Builder lets you visually create and edit UI using UIElements, UXML, and USS.

You can open the UI Builder via the main menu: Window > UI > UI Builder

samples.description: Main game screen derived from the Unite CPH 2019 Tanks demo.
